Interface Record

      Changes contact value, changes value of all identical contacts

      Clears all resources within Record object, using it after delete will result in undefined behavior and exceptions.

      Getter for list of values of given contact type

      Removes contact specified by type and uniquely specified by value, erases all copies

    • Method Detail

      • isExpense

        boolean isExpense()
        Checks if record is expense
        Returns:
        True if expense, else false

      • isRevenue

        boolean isRevenue()
        Checks if record is revenue
        Returns:
        True if revenue, else false

      • addContact

        Record addContact(java.lang.String type,
                  java.lang.String value)
        Adds a new contact
        Parameters:
        type - contact type
        value - contact value
        Returns:
        reference to the current Record object

      • removeContact

        Record removeContact(java.lang.String type,
                     java.lang.String value)
        Removes contact specified by type and uniquely specified by value, erases all copies
        Parameters:
        type - contact type
        value - contact value
        Returns:
        reference to the current Record object

      • changeValue

        Record changeValue(java.lang.String type,
                   java.lang.String value)
            throws cz.pb138.accounting.db.impl.AccountingException
        Changes value of unique attribute (specified by it's type only)
        Parameters:
        type - attribute type
        value - new attribute value
        Returns:
        reference to current Record object
        Throws:
        cz.pb138.accounting.db.impl.AccountingException - specified by ADBErrorCode

      • changeValue

        Record changeValue(java.lang.String type,
                   java.lang.String oldValue,
                   java.lang.String newValue)
        Changes contact value, changes value of all identical contacts
        Parameters:
        type - contact type
        oldValue - instance specifying value, old contact value
        newValue - new contact value
        Returns:
        reference to current Record object

      • getValue

        java.lang.String getValue(java.lang.String type)
        Getter for unigue attribute values
        Parameters:
        type - attribute type
        Returns:
        attribute value

      • getContact

        java.lang.String[] getContact(java.lang.String type)
        Getter for list of values of given contact type
        Parameters:
        type - contact type
        Returns:
        array of given contact values

      • addItem

        Record addItem(java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String description,
               java.lang.String quantity,
               java.lang.String unit,
               java.lang.String price)
        Adds new item with values specified by parameters
        Parameters:
        name - item name
        description - item description
        quantity - item quantity
        unit - item unit
        price - item total price
        Returns:
        reference to the current Record object

      • getItems

        Item[] getItems()
        Tranforms all items into array of arays of attributes
        Returns:
        array of attributes arrays in order of [name, description, quantity, unit, price]

      • isOpen

        boolean isOpen()
        Check if the record is open, has not been deleted
        Returns:
        true if open, else false

      • delete

        void delete()
        Clears all resources within Record object, using it after delete will result in undefined behavior and exceptions. If it represented editable record, delete() erases it from the database.
